pageContent: Background: While the traditional goal in the management of patients with prostate cancer has been to maximize survival, the recent advent of the medical outcomes movement has underscored the importance of patient-centered issues, such as health-related quality of life (HRQOL).

metaData.source:
Patient and community preferences for outcomes in prostate cancer: implications for clinical policy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12544552/
